titleStmt.title: The whole duty of a Christian, or, The character of a true beleever, that walks in some measure answerable to the Gospel, his Christian profession, and the millions of mercies he hath received ... by R.Y. of Roxwell in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Younge. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Author's initials appear after edition statement.
